mdRecord.dcterms:title: Thatto Heath Mystery; 01 of 01
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 3. Doepner/Faulds--NotesItems 1-134--Clippings ScrapbookPage 20; "Restless Spirit. Thatto Heath Mystery to be Investigated."; The 'haunted' house at Thatto Heath, St. Helens was looked at by spiritualists. It was said to be a harmless matter and could be treated by mediums. This type of occurrence termed 'psychical' phenomena.; no pub info; DF 654
